title: 3-(Sulfamic acid)-propyltriethoxysilane on biochar nanoparticles as a practical, biocompatible, recyclable and chemoselective nanocatalyst in organic reactions
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22147-22158
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02265C, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Norolhoda Emad-Abbas, Jalil Naji, Parisa Moradi, Tavan Kikhavani
Biochar nanoparticles were functionalized by 3-(sulfamic acid)-propyltriethoxysilane (SAPES) as nanocatalyst in the synthesis of sulfoxides and tetrahydrobenzo[b]pyrans.
